subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
From {{der|zh|ine-toc-pro|*ḿət(ə)}}, from {{der|zh|ine-pro|*médʰu||mead}}. Compare {{cog|txb|mit||honey}}.

Sense “mistress, young girl” is additionally a {{psm|zh|en|miss|nocap=1}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
Compounds
subSections.text:
{{zh-der|仙草蜜|六波羅蜜|刀頭蜜|口甜如蜜|口蜜腹劍|度蜜月|搖蜜|水蜜桃|波羅蜜|甜嘴蜜舌|甜甜蜜蜜|甜蜜|甜言蜜語|糖舌蜜口|糖蜜|花甜蜜嘴|花蜜|蜂蜜|蜜丸子|蜜供|蜜房|蜜月|蜜月期|蜜月橋牌|蜜林檎|蜜果冰|蜜柑|蜜棗|蜜橘|蜜橙糕|蜜水|蜜源|蜜煎|蜜筒|蜜糕|蜜罐兒|蜜腺|蜜色|蜜蜂|蜜蟻|蜜蠟|蜜裡調油|蜜豆冰|蜜酒|蜜餞|蜜餞砒霜|蜜香|釀蜜|黃花蜜菜|蜜糖}}

{{zh-cat|Intermediate}}

subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=on|みつ}}

Borrowed from {{bor|ja|ltc|sort=みつ|-}} {{m|ltc|蜜|tr=*mjit}}, from Late {{der|ja|och|sort=みつ|*mjit}} ~ {{m|och|*mit}}, from {{der|ja|ine-toc-pro|sort=みつ|*ḿət(ə)}} (whence {{cog|txb|mit||honey}}), from {{der|ja|ine-pro|*médʰu||mead}} (whence {{cog|grc|μέθῠ}}, {{cog|en|mead}}, {{cog|sa|मधु|tr=mádhu}}).

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|餡蜜|あんみつ}}: a dessert made of bean jam, agar gelatin, and fruit served in syrup
* {{ja-r|花蜜|かみつ}}: [[flower]] [[nectar]]
* {{ja-r|氷蜜|こおりみつ}}: finely ground [[rock candy]] cooked with [[egg white]], mixed with cold water as a [[beverage]]
* {{ja-r|五波羅蜜|ご はらみつ}}: the five {{m|sa|पारमिता||perfection; completeness}} practiced by a [[bodhisattva]] to reach [[nirvana]]
* {{ja-r|砂糖蜜|さとう みつ}}: [[sugar]] [[syrup]]
* {{ja-r|十波羅蜜|じっぱらみつ}}: the ten {{m|sa|पारमिता||perfection; completeness}} required for [[nirvana]] in [[w:Theravada|Theravāda Buddhism]]
* {{ja-r|四波羅蜜|し はらみつ}}: the four {{m|sa|पारमिता||perfection; completeness}} required for nirvana in certain types of [[esoteric]] [[Buddhism]]
* {{ja-r|白蜜|しろみつ}}: light-colored [[honey]]
* {{ja-r|水密|すいみつ}}: short for {{ja-r|水密桃|すいみつとう}}
* {{ja-r|水密桃|すいみつとう}}: a large kind of [[peach]] originally from China, with soft, sweet, juicy flesh
* {{ja-r|石蜜|せきみつ}}: [[crystallized]] [[honey]]; [[rock candy]]
* {{ja-r|酥蜜|そみつ}}, {{ja-r|蘇蜜|そみつ}}: a [[mixture]] of [[butter]] [[fat]] and [[honey]], used [[medicinally]] or as a [[sweetener]]
* {{ja-r|檀波羅蜜|だん はらみつ}}: the {{m|sa|पारमिता||perfection; completeness}} of {{m|sa|दान||generosity, giving}}
* {{ja-r|糖蜜|とうみつ}}: [[syrup]], [[treacle]], [[molasses]]
* {{ja-r|忍辱波羅蜜|にんにく はらみつ}}: the {{m|sa|पारमिता||perfection; completeness}} of {{m|sa|क्षान्ति||patience}}
* {{ja-r|廃糖蜜|はい とうみつ}}: leftover sugars from [[sugar beet]] or [[sugar cane]] [[refining]], high in [[glucose]] and [[fructose]], used to make [[alcohol]] or [[candy]]
* {{ja-r|蜂蜜|はちみつ}}: [[honey]]
* {{ja-r|波羅蜜|はらみつ}}: {{m|sa|पारमिता||perfection; completeness}} in [[Buddhism]]
* {{ja-r|般若波羅蜜|はんにゃ はらみつ}}: the {{m|sa|पारमिता||perfection; completeness}} of {{m|sa|प्रज्ञा||wisdom}}
* {{ja-r|六波羅蜜|ろく はらみつ}}: the six {{m|sa|पारमिता||perfection; completeness}} required for [[nirvana]] in [[w:Mahāyāna|Mahāyāna Buddhism]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: Only used on its own. Not used in compounds.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: From {{der|ryu|ltc|蜜|tr=*mjit}}, from Late {{der|ryu|och|*mjit}} ~ {{m|och|*mit}}, from {{der|ryu|ine-toc-pro|sort=みつ|*ḿət(ə)}} (whence {{cog|txb|mit||honey}}), from {{der|ryu|ine-pro|*médʰu||mead}} (whence {{cog|grc|μέθῠ}}, {{cog|en|mead}}, {{cog|sa|मधु|tr=mádhu}}).
